Articles.Content:
The probes reach Moho, but apparently Moho is so hot, that the probes overheat because they have no radiators.

I build a mothership in orbit wich I'll later send to Dres to investigate that canyon.

The Kraken decides to eat the docking ports.

I start a new career game.

Physics says no.

 

I land on Eve and return to orbit.

Your mothership was accidentally skimming the atmosphere, and it unloaded.

 

I go to the mun successfully, go back, and land successfully.

The astronauts all die in quarantine.

 

An interstellar mission to colonize the galaxy.

The wormhole rips apart the ship, and so one of the crew has to push books off a shelf from the 5th dimension.

I send a probe to Jool to "impact", much like the Galileo "lander".

But your ship's computer operating system was just upgraded  to 1.1.2 and you realize your lander craft legs work even worse now...

You realize someone repackaged your parachutes backwards...

You die becase PhysKraken.

 

I create nothing.

And it still explodes for no reason.

 

I send a probe to get science from Eeloo before continuing on out of the solar system

It accidentally crashes into Jool.

I build a stock helicopter.

the kraken looks upon it, smiles, and releases his wrath...

 

I build a large ship with tons of kerbals to impact bop so that the kraken can feast on the kerbal souls...

You decide to go so fast that your ship clips through Bop and accelerates to c2 as it's shooting out of the solar system.

I'm sending a 64-kerbal station to Jool...

It crashes into bop, the souls get eaten by The Lord...

 

i make a space station around dres to glitch the small world out of existance...

It doesn't go away. You keep trying, refueling and expanding your station until you realize you have completed the Dres Awareness challenge.

I start a base on Minmus.

It accidentally lands on the Mun.

I am sending an atmospheric entry probe to Jool.

Edited May 1, 2016 by Interplanet Janet

It discovers that Jool has no atmosphere.

I make a space elevator on Minmus.

The tether breaks and it comes crashing down...very very slowly. Still, none of the kerbals on the ground get out of the way.

 

I send a team of scientists to explore ancient alien ruins on a distant moon to discover the origins of kerbal-kind.

They, being scientists, cannot control the ship and smash into the ancient ruins.

I'm sending a huge base with radiators to Moho.

You put on so many radiators the crew froze to death

 

I am working on a multi-launch Munar ore finding/drilling operation.

Some idiot as KSP administration thinks it's easier to train professional drillers to be kerbal-nauts than it is to train kerbal-nauts to be drillers, ends up sending Bruce Willis Kerman, Ben Kaffleck Kerman, and a ragtag crew of drillers on the mission. It naturally ends in disaster, because the best drillers in the world aren't really cut out to be kerbal-nauts. Go figure.

 

Sending a rescue mission to investigate an emergency beacon originating in Jool orbit that matches the signature of a ship we sent out there seven years ago to test an experimental warp field propulsion system. They had disappeared without a trace. But now they're back. Creepy. Wonder what they'll find...

Kerbin get annihilated  by the Dalecs before you can send the mission.

 

@Choctofliatrio2.0 somehow posts in my real life.

Well, if you print out forum posts, isn't it real life? 

I send the kraken killer 9001 to Bop...

It fails.

 

I do this: 9p42q7c6n-pq8ybtp0[nr347982pt97423495F6H-P439865PH386fn3057hjgfjp6h2ot94

SINTAX ERROR. 

i send the 1.1 hype train to destroy Bop...

It crashes because you're not a hypetrain driver.

I build a rocket car!
